about.title: About Me
about.content:
2 years of frontend implementation experience, 2 years of UI design experience, using React ecosystem, TypeScript, Tailwind... and other web technologies

When serving enterprises, I mainly focus on frontend interface development, API integration, basic micro-backend deployment, cross-device layout renovation and implementation.

Through numerous Side Projects, I have accumulated project development experience across different industries, including AI image batch automation generation, Node.js Script tools, enterprise AppScript integration, mixing tools, n8n workflows, and creating cross-platform mobile interactive games using Angular.js.

Skilled in rapid iteration and the ability to build and implement prototypes.

footer.description: At the intersection of code, design, and art, creating visual engines.
